You are registered for Write Like the Best Legal Writers* with Adjunct Writing Professor, David Kemp on Friday, February 3, 2023 at 11:00 a.m. PT. Review the agenda here and don’t forget to mark your calendar for this can’t-miss presentation!

Reminder: While all Justia Connect members are invited to attend the presentation, only Justia Connect Pro members are eligible to receive CLE credit. If you are not already a Pro, you can upgrade to Justia Connect Pro here.
*This presentation is approved for one hour of general MCLE credit in California.
